```{r Table}
season <- read_csv("2020-2021.csv")
season <- season %>%
  filter(PitchCall == "InPlay") %>%
  select(Date, Batter, ExitSpeed)
datatable(season, rownames = FALSE, class = 'cell-border stripe', caption = 'Recent Exit Speeds', options = list(pageLength = 5, order = list(list(0, "asc"), list(2, 'desc'))))
```
